text: Ovoid vertebral bodies - Paraplegia - Pathologic fracture - Pes planus - Prominent forehead - Radial bowing - Radial head subluxation - Severe short stature - Short femoral neck - Short long bone - Short metacarpal - Short nail - Short neck - Slender long bone - Soft, doughy skin - Sparse scalp hair - Spinal cord compression - Spondyloepimetaphyseal dysplasia - Talipes equinovarus - Ventricular septal defect - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or s
